DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective aim assess effect regular consumption red raspberry ( RRB ) without fructooligosaccharide ( FOS ) composition gut microbiota 4 week intake parallel characterize plasma urine metabolite profile examine qualitative quantitative intervention associate change .
DOC.detailed_description: The study perform single-blinded , randomize , crossover manner . Thirty subject ( 20 insulin resistant subject 10 healthy subject ) randomly assign one two sequence : sequence A ( n=15 ) RRB RRB+FOS ( mean subject consume RRB ( 125 g/day ( ) ( equivalent 1 cup fresh RRB ) ) breakfast 4 week , 4-week washout period , subject consume RRB FOS ( 125 g/d RRB 8 g/d FOS ) 4 week ) ; sequence B ( n=15 ) RRB+FOS RRB ( mean subject receive RRB FOS 4 week , 4-week washout , RRB another 4-week ) . At begin end 4-week treatment , subject undergo 6-h Study Day ( 4 study day 12-week study duration ) follow 1-h next morning follow-up visit . Subjects require meet several inclusion exclusion criterion , assess online survey on-site clinic assessment , include questionnaire , blood analysis anthropometric measure . Eligible subject invite participate study . Each subject ask come 1 Screening Visit , 4 dinner pick-ups ( day Study Day ) , 4 Study Days 6 Weekly Meetings . During Screening Visit , subject read , sign date write Institutional Review Board approve Informed Consent Form prior perform study procedure . And assessed qualification , instructed process complete study questionnaire counsel restrict intake color plant food rich phytonutrients 3 day prior Study Day . They ask restrict alcohol intake , coffee/tea/ caffeinated beverage intake moderate / vigorous physical activity drink plenty water maintain hydration 24 h prior Study Day . They instruct come Clinical Nutrition Research Center ( CNRC ) day Study Day pick dinner meal even snack . Subjects ask get least 7 hour sleep come CNRC 10-h overnight fast Study Day . Each Study Day require subject clinic ~7 h complete baseline post challenge beverage testing procedure , include 6 h study day 1 h next morning follow-up visit . Subjects evaluate compliance protocol ( diet , exercise , sleep , fast ) , body weight blood pressure measure , ingest cup red raspberry drink ( 250 g RRB ( equivalent 2 cup fresh RRB ) 64 g glucose ) blood , urine feces sample collect .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nonsmoking1 man woman , 2060 year age , inclusive 2 . Group 1 must fast blood glucose 100125 mg/dL inulin ≥ 8 μIU/mL 3 . Group 2 fast blood glucose 100 mg/dL homeostasis model assessment method insulin resistance ( HOMAIR ) [ glucose ( μmol/L ) × insulin ( μunits/μL ) /22.5 ] value le 1 4 . Judged good health basis medical history 5 . Able provide inform consent comply study procedures 6 . Able comply study instruction ( include dietary restriction , consumption study beverage , record food diary GItract questionnaire , sample collection procedure study visit schedule ) 7 . Able maintain usual physical activity pattern 8 . Able abstain alcohol consumption avoid vigorous physical activity 24 hour prior study visit 1 . Systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥100 mm Hg screen visit . 2 . Major trauma surgical event within 2 month longer depend trauma event consultation PI . 3 . Weight change ≥4.5 kg ( 9.9 lb ) within 2 month 4 . Presence chronic constipation , diarrhea chronic gastrointestinal complaint ( e.g . irritable bowel syndrome ) 5 . Had gastrointestinal barium opaque meal within 3 month 6 . History presence clinically important endocrine , cardiovascular ( include , limited , atherosclerotic disease , history myocardial infarction , peripheral arterial disease , stroke ) , pulmonary , biliary , opinion investigator , could interfere interpretation study result 7 . History presence cancer prior 2 year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer 8 . History extreme dietary habit , judge investigator ( e.g. , Atkins diet , etc . ) 9 . History eat disorder ( e.g. , anorexia nervosa , bulimia nervosa , binge eat ) diagnose health professional 10 . Vegan extreme dietary regimen judge investigator . 11 . Has know intolerance sensitivity ingredient study product 12 . Has use antibiotic within previous 2 month 13 . Has use prebiotics , probiotic , drug active gastrointestinal motility , laxative class within 1 month 14 . Has use medication know influence carbohydrate metabolism , include , limited adrenergic blocker , diuretic , hypoglycemic medication , systemic corticosteroid within 2 week 15 . Female , pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy study period 16 . Has participate prebiotics laxative trial within 3 month prior enrollment clinical trial within 1 month 17 . Donated blood within last 3 month 18 . Working overnight ( e.g . 3rd shift ) 19 . Excessive coffee tea consumption ( > 4 cups/day ) 20 . Men woman excessive exercise regularly athlete 21 .
